subject: RFP 200 MW Generating Capacity
body:
Campaign Manager


Campaign Manager


Campaign Manager








Untitled Document








Corn Belt Power Cooperative (CBPC), a generation and transmission cooperative, has issued a Request for Proposals for peaking, intermediate and base load capacity products with associated energy.  CBPC is looking for up to 200MW of capacity.  CBPC invites those entities who have an interest in providing such capacity to submit a proposal in accordance with the RFP. 
 Proposal submittals are due by July 31, 2007. To download a copy of the RFP document, please visit 
http://www.cbpower.coop.
